content.prompt: Which of the following best describes an effect of recent demographic change in the United Kingdom?

choices.label: Recent shortfalls of natural resources have resulted in a negative net migration.
The government has created special economic zones to encourage immigration.
A positive net migration of immigrants that has resulted in social and political tensions.
There has been an urban to rural population shift occurring as a result of overcrowded cities.

unit.text: 5: Political and Economic Changes and Development

topic.text: 5.8: Causes and Effects of Demographic Change

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Describe political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors of a course country.
